headline: Gartner: Don't See Any Potential For Near-Term Upside
summary: Gartner (IT) Q4 2025: revenue growth slowed to 2.2% and CV to 0.8% amid AI disruption fears. Read here for a detailed investment analysis.

headline: IQVIA Q4 Earnings & Revenues Beat Estimates, Increase Y/Y
summary: IQV posted a fourth-quarter 2025 earnings and revenue beat with double-digit Y/Y sales growth, strong segment gains and upbeat 2026 revenue guidance.

raw.headline: IQVIA Q4 Earnings & Revenues Beat Estimates, Increase Y/Y

headline: Gartner Selloff Raises Questions On AI Pivot And Long-Term Growth
summary: Gartner (NYSE:IT) shares fell sharply after its Q4 earnings release, as 2026 guidance pointed to lower sales and earnings than previously expected. Management cited cautious enterprise spending, macroeconomic headwinds, and pressure from AI tools as factors behind the softer outlook. The company also reported a decline in consulting revenue, adding to investor concerns about future growth. Gartner appointed two new board members, including MIT AI and robotics expert Daniela Rus, signaling...

headline: SAS named a Leader in 2026 Gartner Magic Quadrant for Decision Intelligence Platforms

headline: Acalvio Recognized as the current Company to Beat in the 2025 Gartner® AI Vendor Race
summary: Acalvio Technologies, the leader in cyber deception technology, today announced that it has been named the Company To Beat in the Gartner AI Vendor Race: Acalvio Is the Company to Beat in AI-powered Advanced Cyber Deception. Gartner states that "Acalvio delivers the most comprehensive, advanced cyber deception coverage across legacy systems, modern on-premises infrastructure, identity platforms, cloud services, and, most notably, cyber-physical systems.

headline: Earnings Outlook Improves: A Closer Look
summary: Earnings estimates are not only increasing for the Tech sector, but also for some of the economically sensitive areas like the Basic Materials and Industrials sectors. Will the picture remain bright?
